net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class MDPStrategy

java.lang.Object

                      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.MDPStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, AdaptiveStrategy, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class MDPStrategy
extends DiscreteLearnerStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable

A trading strategy that uses an MDP learning algorithm, such as the Q-learning algorithm, to adapt its trading behaviour in successive market rounds. The current market-quote is hashed to produce an integer state value.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $

Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
